titles.title: A bill for the relief of Norman Raymond Lee.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/14/1987--Introduced. Declares that the failure of a named individual to make a proper recordation of his mining claims shall not constitute an abandonment of any of his unpatented mining claims located prior to a specified date.
